languages.text: Когда-то это чудовищное оружие венчало длань хелбрута Крик скверны, презренного героя легиона Несущих Слово. В жестоком бою рука монстра была отсечена, а из запчастей оскверненного болтера было изготовлено новое, более компактное орудие. Дух сей темной реликвии требует, чтобы в священное смазочное масло добавляли свежую кровь невинных.

This abominable weapon once adorned the hand of the Helbrute known as Doomscream, the heinous champion of the Word Bearers Legion. The monster's hand was severed in the heat of battle, and the remains of the corrupted bolter were used to forge a new, more compact weapon. The malevolent spirit dwelling within this dark relic demands that the sacred unguents used to appease it must be mixed with the fresh blood of innocents.
languages.original_text: Когда-то это чудовищное оружие венчало длань хелбрута Крик скверны, презренного героя легиона Несущих Слово. В жестоком бою рука монстра была отсечена, а из запчастей оскверненного болтера было изготовлено новое, более компактное орудие. Дух сей темной реликвии требует, чтобы в священное смазочное масло добавляли свежую кровь невинных.

traits.locale_text: This abominable weapon once adorned the hand of the Helbrute known as Balescream, the heinous champion of the Word Bearers Legion. The monster's hand was severed in the heat of battle, and the remains of the corrupted bolter were used to create a new, more compact weapon. The spirit of this dark relic demands that the sacred unguents used to appease it be mixed with fresh blood of innocents.

The monster's hand was severed in the heat of battle, and the remains of the corrupted bolter were used to create a new, more compact weapon. The spirit of this dark relic demands that the sacred unguents used to appease it be mixed with fresh blood of innocents.

This abominable weapon once adorned the hand of the Helbrute known as Doomscream, the heinous champion of the Word Bearers Legion. The monster's hand was severed in the heat of battle, and the remains of the corrupted bolter were used to forge a new, more compact weapon. The malevolent spirit dwelling within this dark relic demands that the sacred unguents used to appease it must be mixed with the fresh blood of innocents.

This abominable weapon once adorned the hand of the Helbrute known as Doomscream, the heinous champion of the Word Bearers Legion. The monster's hand was severed in the heat of battle, and the remains of the corrupted bolter were used to forge a new, more compact weapon. The malevolent spirit dwelling within this dark relic demands that the sacred unguents used to appease it must be mixed with the fresh blood of innocents.

languages.text: 这把受到诅咒的武器，曾属于一头被称为“灾啸”的地狱兽。这头怪物是怀言者军团的邪恶勇士，在某场激烈的战斗中，它的手被砍断了。遭到腐化的爆矢枪残骸被拆解，被改造成了一把更加小巧玲珑的新武器。这件混沌的遗物上附着恶灵，根据恶灵的要求，用来抚慰这件武器的神圣机油必须含有无辜之人的鲜血。
languages.original_text: This abominable weapon once adorned the hand of the Helbrute known as Doomscream, the heinous champion of the Word Bearers Legion. The monster's hand was severed in the heat of battle, and the remains of the corrupted bolter were used to forge a new, more compact weapon. The malevolent spirit dwelling within this dark relic demands that the sacred unguents used to appease it must be mixed with the fresh blood of innocents.

traits.locale_text: 这把受到诅咒的武器，曾属于一头被称为“灾啸”的地狱兽。这头怪物是怀言者军团的邪恶勇士，在某场激烈的战斗中，它的手被砍断了。遭到腐化的爆矢枪残骸被拆解，被改造成了一把更加小巧玲珑的新武器。这件混沌的遗物上附着恶灵，在恶灵的要求下，用来抚慰这件武器的神圣机油必须含有无辜之人的鲜血。

languages.text: Cette arme abominable équipait jadis la main du Métabrutus connu sous le nom du Fléau Hurlant, l'ignoble champion de la légion des Word Bearers. L'appendice du monstre fut tranché au combat et les restes de son bolter corrompu servirent à forger une nouvelle arme plus compacte. L'esprit malveillant qui hante cette sombre relique réclame que les onguents sacrés utilisés pour l'apaiser soient mélangés au sang frais d'innocents.
languages.original_text: This abominable weapon once adorned the hand of the Helbrute known as Doomscream, the heinous champion of the Word Bearers Legion. The monster's hand was severed in the heat of battle, and the remains of the corrupted bolter were used to forge a new, more compact weapon. The malevolent spirit dwelling within this dark relic demands that the sacred unguents used to appease it must be mixed with the fresh blood of innocents.

traits.locale_text: Cette arme abominable équipait jadis la main du Métabrutus connu sous le nom du Fléau Hurlant, l'ignoble champion de la légion des Word Bearers. L'appendice du monstre fut tranché au combat et les restes de son bolter corrompu servirent à forger une nouvelle arme plus compacte. L'esprit malveillant qui hante cette sombre relique réclame que les onguents sacrés utilisés pour l'apaiser soient mélangés au sang frais d'innocents.

languages.text: ワードベアラー兵団の凶悪な王者であり、ドゥームスクリームと呼ばれるヘルブルートがかつて操っていた忌まわしき武器。怪物の手は戦いのさなかに切断され、破損したボルターの残骸はよりコンパクトな新しい武器を作るために使われた。この暗黒の遺物に宿る邪悪な魂は、鎮静させるために使用する聖なる軟膏に罪なき人々の新鮮な血を混ぜなければならないと要求している。
languages.original_text: This abominable weapon once adorned the hand of the Helbrute known as Doomscream, the heinous champion of the Word Bearers Legion. The monster's hand was severed in the heat of battle, and the remains of the corrupted bolter were used to forge a new, more compact weapon. The malevolent spirit dwelling within this dark relic demands that the sacred unguents used to appease it must be mixed with the fresh blood of innocents.

traits.locale_text: ワードベアラー兵団の凶悪な王者であり、ベイルスクリームと呼ばれるヘルブルートがかつて操っていた忌まわしき武器。怪物の手は戦いのさなかに切断され、破損したボルターの残骸はよりコンパクトな新しい武器を作るために使われた。この暗黒の遺物に宿る邪悪な魂は、鎮静させるために使用する聖なる軟膏に罪なき人々の新鮮な血を混ぜなければならないと要求している。

languages.text: Esta arma abominable engalanaba la mano del Bruto Infernal conocido como Doomscream, el abyecto campeón de la Legión de los Portadores de la Palabra. La mano de este monstruo fue cercenada en el fragor de la batalla y los restos del bólter corrupto sirvieron para forjar un arma nueva y más compacta. El espíritu maligno que mora dentro de esta reliquia oscura exige que los ungüentos sagrados para su apaciguamiento se mezclen con sangre fresca de inocentes.
languages.original_text: This abominable weapon once adorned the hand of the Helbrute known as Doomscream, the heinous champion of the Word Bearers Legion. The monster's hand was severed in the heat of battle, and the remains of the corrupted bolter were used to forge a new, more compact weapon. The malevolent spirit dwelling within this dark relic demands that the sacred unguents used to appease it must be mixed with the fresh blood of innocents.

traits.locale_text: Esta arma abominable engalanaba la mano del Bruto Infernal conocido como Balescream, el abyecto campeón de la Legión de los Portadores de la Palabra. La mano de este monstruo fue cercenada en el fragor de la batalla y los restos del bólter corrupto sirvieron para forjar un arma nueva y más compacta. El espíritu maligno que mora dentro de esta reliquia oscura exige que los ungüentos sagrados para su apaciguamiento se mezclen con sangre fresca de inocentes.

languages.text: Diese abscheuliche Waffe zierte einst die Hand des Höllenschlächters namens Unheilsschrei, den schändlichen Champion der Legion der Word Bearers. Die Hand des Monsters wurde im Gefecht abgetrennt, und aus den Überresten des korrumpierten Bolters wurde eine neue, kompaktere Waffe geschmiedet. Der boshafte Geist, der in diesem dunklen Relikt haust, muss mit heiligen Salbölen besänftigt werden, und er fordert, dass diese Öle mit dem frischen Blut von Unschuldigen vermischt werden.
languages.original_text: This abominable weapon once adorned the hand of the Helbrute known as Doomscream, the heinous champion of the Word Bearers Legion. The monster's hand was severed in the heat of battle, and the remains of the corrupted bolter were used to forge a new, more compact weapon. The malevolent spirit dwelling within this dark relic demands that the sacred unguents used to appease it must be mixed with the fresh blood of innocents.

traits.locale_text: Diese abscheuliche Waffe zierte einst die Hand des Höllenschlächters namens Unheilsschrei, den schändlichen Champion der Legion der Word Bearers. Die Hand des Monsters wurde im Gefecht abgetrennt, und aus den Überresten des korrumpierten Bolters wurde eine neue, kompaktere Waffe geschmiedet. Der boshafte Geist, der in diesem dunklen Relikt haust, muss mit heiligen Salbölen besänftigt werden, und er fordert, dass diese Öle mit dem frischen Blut von Unschuldigen vermischt werden.
